subject: Horse Racing
Heart
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: The Hall of Fame trainer Bob Baffert will be home recovering from a heart attack when Bodemeister and Secret Circle, two Kentucky Derby hopefuls, run in the Arkansas Derby on Saturday.
snippet: The Hall of Fame trainer Bob Baffert will be home recovering from a heart attack when Bodemeister and Secret Circle, two Kentucky Derby hopefuls, run in the Arkansas Derby on Saturday.
